qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run fails in most suites
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: Last full run on 2026-02-10 ended with 35 tests: 28 failed, 6 passed, 1 skipped. Core areas are still unstable across auth, LLM, teams/templates, and stress suites.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.title: waitForHub caused cascading setup timeouts
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.details: Mitigation implemented on 2026-02-10 in frontend-angular/tests/utils.ts: short request timeout, bounded retries, and non-fatal fallback in prepareLoginPage. Revalidate with a full suite run to confirm this blocker is fully resolved.

qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.title: Locally spawned E2E services show intermittent internal health read timeouts
qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.details: During focused reruns after fixes, backend logs repeatedly showed HTTP GET read timeouts to worker /health (port 5501/5502) while tests were running. This likely contributes to suite-wide flakiness and needs stabilization or environment isolation improvements.

qa-2026-02-10-auth-suite-regression-clus.title: Auth-related suites unstable after first failures
qa-2026-02-10-auth-suite-regression-clus.details: auth.spec.ts, auth-rate-limit, auth-password, and auth-mfa remain unstable. Some setup hardening is done, but UI/assertion-level failures still need deterministic selectors, isolated fixtures, and explicit state reset per test.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: audit-logs.spec.ts fails on missing `user-0`/`user-1` rows. Needs deterministic fixture setup and explicit readiness check before asserting table rows.

qa-2026-02-10-settings-mfa-ui-assertions.title: Settings and MFA UI checks are brittle under startup timing
qa-2026-02-10-settings-mfa-ui-assertions.details: auth-password and auth-mfa include fragile waits (for example networkidle and strict element assumptions). Harden flow with API-response-driven waits and resilient selectors.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: llm-config, llm-generate, and templates-ai fail in full run while live-LM test is skipped. Separate deterministic mock assertions from explicit live-provider jobs.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows fail end-to-end
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: team-types-roles, teams CRUD, and templates CRUD suites still fail consistently in full run. Stabilize API fixture isolation and post-login readiness checks.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.title: Reduce recurring 404 noise for /events and /stats/history
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.details: Frequent 404s are mostly non-blocking but hide actionable failures in logs. Align polling endpoints or provide explicit no-op handlers for test mode.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: E2E global setup spends time on repeated pip install
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: Use ANANTA_SKIP_PIP=1 in local loops and add install caching/marker logic in global setup to shorten iteration times.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis warns about vm.overcommit_memory=0. Non-blocking for current tests, but host tuning should be added to setup docs/scripts.
